alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 8:34PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pierce, north central Ware, Bacon, western Wayne, eastern Jeff Davis and Appling Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 834 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hazlehurst to 6 miles north of Dixie Union. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Baxley, Hazlehurst, Alma, Patterson, Graham, Surrency, Plant Hatch, Screven, Odum and Offerman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Bacon; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne
